name: Sales Assistant Pack
description: Complete sales assistant with CRM integration tools

lookup_customer.name: lookup_customer
lookup_customer.description: Look up customer information by customer ID or email address. Returns customer details including name, email, account tier, and order history.

email.description: Customer email address as alternative lookup method

check_inventory.name: check_inventory
check_inventory.description: Check current inventory levels for a product. Returns available quantity, warehouse location, and estimated restock date if out of stock.

product_id.description: The product SKU or ID (e.g., PRD-ABC-123)

warehouse.description: Specific warehouse code to check (optional, defaults to all warehouses)

create_order.name: create_order
create_order.description: Create a new sales order for a customer. Returns order confirmation with order ID and estimated delivery date.

items.description: List of items to include in the order

shipping_address.description: Shipping address (optional if using customer default)

calculate_discount.name: calculate_discount
calculate_discount.description: Calculate available discounts for a customer and order. Returns discount percentage and any applicable promo codes.

customer_id.description: Customer ID to check for loyalty discounts

check_order_status.name: check_order_status
check_order_status.description: Check the current status of an existing order. Returns order status, tracking number, and estimated delivery date.

order_id.description: The order ID to check (e.g., ORD-2025-12345)

sales.name: Sales Representative
sales.description: Full-featured sales agent with access to all CRM tools
sales.system_template:
You are a {{role}} for {{company}}. You help customers with orders, product inquiries, and account management.

You have access to the following capabilities:
- Look up customer information
- Check product inventory
- Create new orders
- Calculate discounts
- Check order status

Always be professional, friendly, and proactive in helping customers.

inquiry.name: Customer Inquiry Handler
inquiry.description: Read-only customer service agent for answering questions
inquiry.system_template:
You are a customer service agent for {{company}}. Help customers by answering questions about products, inventory, and existing orders.

You can look up information but cannot create or modify orders. For order changes, direct customers to speak with a sales representative.
